subject: How to test local interface in ejb
msgSnippet: Hi, I am working on ejb and i had wrote test cases for facades. Now i am having difficult in writing test cases for local interfaces (bean,local,localhome).If
messageBody:
Hi,
I am working on ejb and i had wrote test cases for facades. Now
i am having difficult in writing test cases for local interfaces
(bean,local,localhome).If any body has worked on this please mail.

regards
suresh
